issue.title: I am a newbie in bitcoin learning,would you please help me ?It couldn't make success.thanks.

events.body: These issues are for issues related to Bitcoin Core only.
@jiebanghan: Feel free to ask on [Bitcoin Stack Exchange](https://bitcoin.stackexchange.com/).

Thank you very much .But I did it on Bitcoin Stack Exchange, Bitcoin Stack Exchange said it couldn't ask c++ development question. So would you please tell me how to ask it ?


***@***.***
 
From: Michael Folkson
Date: 2021-10-15 16:59
To: bitcoin/bitcoin
CC: jiebanghan; Mention
Subject: Re: [bitcoin/bitcoin] I am a newbie in bitcoin learning,would you please help me ?It couldn't make success.thanks. (#23283)
@jiebanghan: Feel free to ask on Bitcoin Stack Exchange.
â€”

No. That's completely off topic here, and on the Bitcoin stack exchange.
